thread.title: Someone finally made a drone that's safe for me to headbutt
thread.title_full: Someone finally made a drone that's safe for me to headbutt

title: Someone finally made a drone that's safe for me to headbutt
text: Someone finally made a drone that's safe for me to headbutt Wednesday, 2 September 2015 (3 minutes ago) The average consumer drone has become much cheaper and easier to use over the last three years. But it's still bulky and dangerous when compared to a smartphone on a selfie stick. Snap, a new drone from Vantage Robotics, has a lot of interesting ideas about how to solve these problems. The prototype we played with is a little rough around the edges, but if it can iron out the kinks before shipping, the Snap could greatly expand the potential audience for aerial robots.
